Code Reference¶

class contacts.Application¶

Manages a contact book serving the provided commands.

The contact book itself is saved in a contacts.json file in the same directory where the application is started and it’s loaded back on every new run.

A contact is composed by any name followed by a valid phone number.

run(text)¶

Run a provided command.

Parameters:

text (str) – The string containing the command to run.

Takes the command to run as a string as it would come from the shell, parses it and runs it.

Each command can support zero or multiple arguments separate by an empty space.

Currently supported commands are:

  • add

  • del

  • ls
